title: I cant load into Twisted Treeline
body: I get the bug splat error each time my champ loads to 100%, Its been like this for about a year and decided to try to fix it till now.

replies.body: The bugsplat error is likely caused by a bad game file or driver failing to load the game.  You should go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix that up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
